extensive_training:dialog.endless.1: Attrapes autant de fantômes que tu peux, %s!
extensive_training:dialog.endless.1.more: Attrapez autant de fantômes que vous pouvez, les enfants !
extensive_training:dialog.endless.2: Once you are defeated, I'll count how many you've caught.
extensive_training:dialog.endless.2.more: Once any of you are defeated, I'll count how many you've caught.
extensive_training:dialog.endless.3: Ton record actuel est de %s, essayes de le battre !
extensive_training:dialog.endless.3.alt: You didn't try this mode before, so let's set a base record now.
You didn't try this mode before, so let's set a base record now.
extensive_training:dialog.endless.3.more: Votre record actuel est de %s, essayez de le battre !
extensive_training:dialog.endless.5: Voyons voir combien tu en as capturé...
extensive_training:dialog.endless.5.more: Voyons voir combien vous en avez capturé...
extensive_training:dialog.endless.6.high: You caught %s ghosts! Much better than I expected!
You caught %s ghosts! Much better than I expected!
extensive_training:dialog.endless.6.holy: You caught... %s GHOSTS! I feel like I'm going to faint from the excitement!
You caught... %s GHOSTS! I feel like I'm going to faint from the excitement!
extensive_training:dialog.endless.6.medi: You caught %s ghosts. That's pretty good.
You caught %s ghosts. That's pretty good.
extensive_training:dialog.endless.6.none: You didn't catch a single one? Oh my...
You didn't catch a single one? Oh my...
extensive_training:dialog.endless.no: Hmm, you didn't beat your record of %s ghosts, that's too bad.
extensive_training:dialog.endless.no.1: Hmm, you didn't beat your record of 1 ghost, that's too bad.
extensive_training:dialog.endless.no.1.m: Hmm, you didn't beat your record of 1 ghost, that's too bad.
extensive_training:dialog.endless.no.mor: Hmm, you didn't beat your record of %s ghosts, that's too bad.
extensive_training:dialog.endless.yes: Well done, it's a new record!
extensive_training:dialog.pvp.1: You want to see which of you is the best?
extensive_training:dialog.pvp.2: Very well, I'll spawn 10 waves of random ghosts.
extensive_training:dialog.pvp.3: Each ghost is worth points based on their health.
extensive_training:dialog.pvp.4: Whoever has the most points by wave 10 wins.
extensive_training:dialog.pvp.5: If it's a tie, I'll spawn a powerful tiebreaker ghost in from the middle back platform that won't disappear when it vanishes.
extensive_training:dialog.pvp.death: You fainted, that means you are out of the contest.
extensive_training:dialog.pvp.no_multipl: Sorry to say this, but this program requires several people in the training room.
Come back when you made some friends, %s.
extensive_training:dialog.pvp.tie.it: Catch this ghost and you win!
extensive_training:dialog.pvp.tie.not_it: Sorry to say, this tiebreaker is not for you.
extensive_training:dialog.speedrun.1: Catch all the ghosts as quickly as you can, %s!
extensive_training:dialog.speedrun.1.mor: Catch all the ghosts as quickly as you can, kiddos!
extensive_training:dialog.speedrun.2: Once all ghosts are defeated, I'll check how long it took you.
extensive_training:dialog.speedrun.2.mor: Once all ghosts are defeated, I'll check how long it took you.
extensive_training:dialog.speedrun.3: Your current record is %s%s:%s%s:%s%s, try to beat it!
extensive_training:dialog.speedrun.3.alt: You haven't beaten this mode before, so let's set a base record now.
You haven't beaten this mode before, so let's set a base record now.
extensive_training:dialog.speedrun.3.mor: Your current record is %s%s:%s%s:%s%s, try to beat it!
extensive_training:dialog.speedrun.4: Wew! That's how to do it, kiddo!
extensive_training:dialog.speedrun.4.mor: Wew! That's how to do it, kiddos!
extensive_training:dialog.speedrun.5: Voyons voir combien de temps ça t'a pris...
extensive_training:dialog.speedrun.5.mor: Voyons voir combien de temps ça vous a pris...
extensive_training:dialog.speedrun.6.fas: You did it in %s%s:%s%s:%s%s! Much better than I expected!
You did it in %s%s:%s%s:%s%s! Much better than I expected!
extensive_training:dialog.speedrun.6.hol: You did it in... %s%s:%s%s:%s%s! I... I have no words for this! You are one awesome ghostbuster!
You did it in... %s%s:%s%s:%s%s! I... I have no words for this! You are one awesome team of ghostbusters!
extensive_training:dialog.speedrun.6.med: You did it in %s%s:%s%s:%s%s. That's pretty good.
You did it in %s%s:%s%s:%s%s. That's pretty good.
extensive_training:dialog.speedrun.6.slo: You did it in %s%s:%s%s:%s%s... How petty...
You did it in %s%s:%s%s:%s%s... How petty...
extensive_training:dialog.speedrun.defea: Oh no, are you alright, kiddo?
Oh no, are you alright, kiddos?
I'm sorry, but I can't count this as a success...
extensive_training:dialog.speedrun.no: Hmm, you didn't beat your record of %s%s:%s%s:%s%s, that's too bad.
extensive_training:dialog.speedrun.no.mo: Hmm, you didn't beat your record of %s%s:%s%s:%s%s, that's too bad.
extensive_training:dialog.speedrun.yes: Bien joué, c'est un nouveau record !
extensive_training:dialog.underground_la: Ne subit aucun dégât quand attraper par un fantôme.
extensive_training:message.gallery.troph: Obtenez un record d'au moins 250 fantômes dans le programme Sans Fin de la salle d'entraînement.
Terminez le programme speedrun de la salle d'entraînement en 20 minutes.
Obtenez un record d'au moins 100 fantômes dans le programme Sans Fin de la salle d'entraînement.
Terminez le programme speedrun de la salle d'entraînement en 15 minutes.
Obtenez un record d'au moins 50 fantômes dans le programme Sans Fin de la salle d'entraînement.
Capture the basher Speedy Spirit in the endless training room program.
Se faire battre par la première vague de fantômes dans le programme Sans Fin de la salle d'entraînement.
Reach the element-hearted ghost wave in the endless training room program.
Clear the speedrun training room program in 10 minutes.
